name: Life as a Dragon - Chapter 1
description:
Description

Experience life living as a dragon hatchling. The world is vast and uncertainty, dare you explore and uncover secrets of the world you live in, or live comfortably in your territory? 

Features

More than 34 maps to discover.

Each map is assigned a biome. Different biomes contain different flora and fauna.

Your experience is only limited by your energy - use it wisely!


Release Date

13th of November 2019


Platform

PC Windows XP


Contact

fetusworkmail@gmail.com


Personal Bio

Fetus is an artist and writer, now dabbling in the craft of game programming.  Although many bugs will be created by abysmal coding, Fetus hopes to create games people will enjoy.
